resources.string: Powered by Forecast API and Geonames API
Add your own Pants idea to the next update of Weather Pants!

Type in your Pants idea and send it to us. If you make us laugh we will use your idea! Remember to keep it fairly clean we\'re a medium maturity app. There is no payment or credit for submissions. If we use your idea we have the right to modify it if necessary.

We want to hear from you! If you have any feedback on WeatherPants please let us know. If you have any problems or just want to put in your 2 cents we want to hear about it. Just click on the email address below and tell us what you think.
Hey! If you like WeatherPants it would be cool if you would rate us and write a review. Just click on the star!
